```{r}



library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

info_t <- dataset_results <- read.csv(file.choose(),header=TRUE, sep = ",")
str(info_t)

#DISPERSION
#1.1
info_t %>%
  group_by(price, carat)%>%
  summarize(price = median(price), carat = max(carat))

ggplot(info_t, aes(x=carat, y=price))+
  geom_point() + 
    expand_limits(y=0)


#1.2 y 1.3

info_t %>%
  group_by(price, carat)%>%
  summarize(price = median(price), carat = max(carat))

ggplot(info_t, aes(x=carat, y=price, color = clarity))+
  geom_point() + 
    expand_limits(y=0)


#HISTOGRAMA
#2.1
info_t%>%
 
  group_by(price)%>%
  summarize(median_price = median(price)) %>%
  #summarize(price=median(price))

ggplot(aes(x=median_price))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 40)#+
  #scale_x_log10()


#2.2

info_t%>%
 
  group_by(price)%>%
  summarize(median_price = median(price)) %>%
  

ggplot(aes(x=median_price))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 40)+
  scale_x_log10()


# 3 BOXPLOTS
#3.1
info_t%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=cut, y=price))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  scale_y_log10()

#3.2

info_t%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=cut, y=price, fill = cut))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  scale_y_log10()



#4FACETING 
#4.1 
filtered_price  <-  diamonds%>%
  filter(price > 1000 & cut %in% c("Good", "Ideal", "Premium"))

#4.2
ggplot(filtered_price, aes(x=cut, y=depth))+
  geom_col()

#4.3  
ggplot(filtered_price, aes(x=cut, y=depth))+
  geom_col()+
  facet_wrap(~ clarity)

#4.3

  
ggplot(filtered_price, aes(x=cut, y=depth))+
  geom_col()+
  facet_grid(. ~ clarity)


#4.4

ggplot(filtered_price, aes(x=cut, y=depth, fill = clarity))+
  geom_col()+
  facet_grid(. ~ clarity)
```
